Package com.src.business

Class DBUtils

java.lang.Object
com.src.business.DBUtils
@Repository
public class DBUtils
extends java.lang.Object
Author:
Mihnea A utility class to handle the database operations. The database can only be accessed to this class

    • getProductByNameAndStore

      public Product getProductByNameAndStore​(java.lang.String productName, Store store)
      Finds a product in the database and returns it using a given name and a Store It uses the Query By Example method for query creation
      Parameters:
      productName - - name of the Product to find
      store - - Store that houses the searched Product
      Returns:
      - the found Product if it exists, null otherwise

    • updateOrderSum

      public void updateOrderSum​(java.lang.Float sum, Order order)
      Updates the sum column for an existing Order
      Parameters:
      sum - - the new sum for the Order
      order - - the Order to be updated

    • addProductToOrder

      public void addProductToOrder​(Product product, Order order)
      Adds a new Product to an existing Order
      Parameters:
      product - - the new Product to add
      order - - the Order receiving the new Product

    • findStoreByName

      public Store findStoreByName​(java.lang.String storeName)
      Searches the database for a Store using a given name, and returns it It uses the Query By Example method for query creation
      Parameters:
      storeName - - the name of the Store to find
      Returns:
      - the found Store if it exists, null otherwise

    • updateStores

      public void updateStores​(Order order)
      Updates the Stores in a given Order to have information about this new Order It uses the Query By Example method for query creation
      Parameters:
      order - - the Order whose Stores are to be updated

    • getProducts

      public java.util.List<Product> getProducts​(Store store)
      Returns all the Products in a given Store It uses the Query By Example method for query creation
      Parameters:
      store - - the Store whose Products are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      - the List of Products in the given Store

    • getProductsOnSale

      public java.util.List<Sale> getProductsOnSale​(Store store)
      Returns all the Sales in a given Store It uses the Query By Example method for query creation
      Parameters:
      store - - the Store whose Sales are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      - the List of Sales in the given Store

    • getOrderedOrders

      public java.util.List<Order> getOrderedOrders()
      Returns all the Orders in the database, ordered by the Order's sum in descending order, and then by the client's name in ascending order. It uses the Hibernate Criteria Queries method for query creation.
      Returns:
      - the List of all ordered Orders

    • getProductByNameAndPrice

      public Product getProductByNameAndPrice​(java.lang.String productName, java.lang.Float price, Store store)
      Returns the first Product that matches the given name, price and Store. It uses the Query by Example technique for query creation.
      Parameters:
      productName - - the name of the Product we are looking for
      price - - the price of the Product we are looking for
      store - - the Store we are searching in
      Returns:
      - the found Product if it exists, null otherwise
